title: Amy Childs flaunts her two stone weight loss in sizzling bikini selfie
text:
She's been working hard on her health in the past year.

And Amy Childs celebrated her two stone weight loss on Tuesday by comparing photos of herself earlier this year to her new slimmed down physique.

The ex TOWIE star shared her weight loss journey with her Instagram fans, admitting it's been hard fitting in her workouts with two children.

Proud: Amy Childs celebrated her two stone weight loss on Tuesday by comparing photos of herself earlier this year to her new slimmed down physique

Posing in the same rolled up black vest top and underwear, Amy posted two photos side by side to demonstrate the results of her diet and fitness regime over the past six months.

The recent photos sees Amy proudly lifting up her top to show off her stomach as she snaps a selfie in the mirror.

'Sometimes you’ve gotta take a look back to see how far you’ve come!' she captioned the post.

'I can honestly say that I’ve really enjoyed the journey too,' she added, explaining that working on her own post-natal fitness plan has pushed her harder.

Working hard: The ex TOWIE star shared her weight loss journey with her Instagram fans, admitting it's been hard fitting in her workouts with two children

'Fitting in my workouts hasn’t always been easy but I’ve literally loved them all cos they make me feel so positive and creating mum.fit I know is helping so many other people do the same. Mums...we’ve got this!'

She ended the post with the hashtags '#postnatal #postnatalfitness #fitmum #happymum.'

Amy has been keeping her fans up to date with her regime, sharing another proud selfie on Thursday.

Highlighting her taut stomach and toned frame in a tiny leopard print bikini, the 29-year-old reality star looked sensational in the snap.

Stunning: Amy has been keeping her fans up to date with her regime, sharing another proud selfie on Thursday

Alongside the image, the mother-of-two reflected on her weight loss journey as she penned: 'A dream doesn’t become reality through magic, it takes sweat , determination and hard work ....

'Mums I have been reading all of your messages on my social media, your lovely comments, thank you..... I feel overwhelmed with your messages

'Remember it took me 6 months losing my baby weight, there was no rush losing my baby weight , just consistency, doing my “MUM FIT” everyday indoors around the kids it wasn’t a quick fix , it was determination and seeing results after a few weeks [sic]'.

She continued: 'so mums my link is in bio, if I can do it you can all do it, just put your mind to it. Also sorry about the overload of bikini selfies sorry not sorry ..... [sic]'.

Tanned and toned: Amy, who recently launched a post-natal fitness plan, also wowed her followers with another stunning bikini snap on Tuesday

Amy, who recently launched a post-natal fitness plan, also wowed her followers with another stunning selfie on Tuesday.

She captioned the snap: 'So can’t believe I’m posting this picture!

'So nearly 2 stone down ... I can now say I have finally lost my baby weight! omg omg OMG !!! So happy... I’m feeling the best I have ever felt, even before I had my children! [sic]'

'I've got my mojo back': Amy previously revealed she's lost two stone and dropped from a UK size 14 to a 10 in just seven months (pictured L earlier this month, R in April)

It comes after she revealed the father of her first child is back in prison after being found guilty of arson, handling stolen goods and dangerous driving.

The former TOWIE star is a parent to two-year old Polly, the younger of her two children, with former partner Bradley Wright.

But the builder, who has previously served time for similar offences, is now awaiting another spell at Her Majesty’s pleasure after pleading guilty at Basildon Crown Court. He will be sentenced in November.

Opening up: Amy recently revealed the father of her first child is back in prison after being found guilty of arson, handling stolen goods and dangerous driving

However Amy admits she wasn’t surprised after discovering Polly’s father was behind bars following another string of convictions.

She told new magazine: 'I got a phone call, I wasn't shocked at all. Now I feel for Polly because she's going to have a dad in prison.

'I don't want it to be embarrassing for her. It's such a small area so people will know Brad and I don't want that for her.'

Devoted mother: The former TOWIE star is a parent to two-year old Polly, the younger of her two children, with former partner Bradley Wright

It was in 2014 that Bradley, while dating Amy, was originally sentenced to 18-months behind bars for handling stolen goods.

That conviction followed previous prison terms, including 16-months for theft in 2013 and a spell at a young offenders institute for burglary, handling stolen goods and driving offences in 2010.

The couple reunited following his release, and subsequently welcomed daughter Polly - their only child together - in April 2017.

Behind bars: The builder, who has previously served time for similar offences, is now awaiting another spell at Her Majesty’s pleasure after pleading guilty at Basildon Crown Court

But just six weeks after her birth they separated, with Amy eventually embarking on a new relationship with businessman Ritchie.

The pair welcomed a son together in September 2018, but the former TV personality has since revealed she is now single.

'Any break-up is hard, let alone with a baby involved,' she said of their split. 'Of course I've been upset. There have been times I've cried, definitely. This isn't the life I'd dreamed I'd have, being a single mum. But we're happy and healthy.'

Amy also revealed she won't be taking Polly to visit her father in prison, because he has only seen her 'about four times' throughout her young life.

'If he was an amazing dad, then yes,' she said. 'But as he's only been in her life for six months I definitely wouldn't.'
description: She worked hard to lose two stone in six months.  And Amy Childs showed off her incredible transformation in a stunning bikini selfie as she took to Instagram on Thursday.
